name: Men's Slim Fit Suit One Button 3-Piece Blazer Dress Business Wedding Party Jacket Vest & Pant
description:
‚òõüòáThis tuxedo suit with full shoulder design and slim cut with 3D draping. Slim fit suits little tighter than a regular fit suit. When you put on it make you slimmer and sharp. And looks modern and handsome.
‚òõüòòIt's suitable for multi-occasions,like wedding, daily life, business meeting, any fashion forward parties, any grandly holiday and ect. It is also prefect for the young men prepare for the Homingcming and back to school.
‚òõüòèSuit is men's symbol. There is nothing as cool as confident. The prefect and comfortable suit doesn't cost hundreds of dollars to buy. It's a very affordable price, but it's not cheap.
‚òõüòáDry cleaning,Low iron if possible. lease reference to the‚Äú product description‚Äù before purchasing, choose your favorite colors and style, and refer the size chart , choose according to your size

reviews.content:
First of all for the money to suit is nice. I am a very active, and I am an athlete. My true size should have been a 2X, but because I have really broad shoulders a 2X jacket would not fit. So I had to go up to a 3X. The was too large, the only thing that fit perfectly was the best that came with the suit. My seamstress altered the jacket and the pants to fit me. Now the suit fit me perfect. The alterations cost the same amount as the suit.

I know this is easier said than done but it should be an option where you can mix and match maybe a 2X pant with a 3X jacket so maybe you don't have to alterate the whole entire suit just one piece to make it fit.

Son agreed to go to homecoming at last minute and no time for shopping for suits in stores.

Clearly not tailored but jacket easily could be for a custom fit.

Great value for growing teen as he likely will be too big for this in a year from now.

Son is 5'10 and 167 lbs in this size large.

Waist has hidden stretch and was needed for him. Eliminated the need for a belt, he kept the jacket on the entire night so no one could ever tell that he was missing a belt. Certain that a belt would hide the fact that the waistline is flexible.

Vest is great for wearing more casual with dress shirt and jeans. Will likely wear more than any other part of the suit.

Did take to the cleaners on the day it arrived for one pressing to get the folded wrinkles out.

Well worth the price and convenience.

Very pleased overall!

I‚Äôm 5‚Äô8 220 and read other reviews and the company suggested to get a XXL, however I ordered an XL and the top fits perfectly. The coat is at the right arm length and fit snug. The pants were long but that should be expected. Overall a really good suit!

name: Men's Suits 3 Piece Slim Fit Suit Set,Two Button Wedding Business Tuxedo Solid Blazer Jacket Vest Pants with Tie
description:
Material:70% Polyester and 30% Viscose for outer,it is comfortable, breathable, softer, smoother, easier to wash and keep the shape.90% polyester and 10% viscose for inner, It is breathe freely and absorb sweat.
Package including:Jacket+vest+pants.3 pieces suits;The color of tie is random;Cleaning: Dry-clean only; Storage: Always hang on; Pressing: Steam ironing.
Design:This tuxedo/suit set is with slim-fitting cut from 3D draping. Slim-fitting suits are a little tighter than regular suits. They make you look slimmer and smarter.
Occasions:This tuxedo/suit set is suitable for multiple occasions,such as weddings ,business meetings,fashion shows, parties,prom,daily life,homecoming and back to school,any fashion forward parties,any holiday,work and other Formal Occasions.Good Gift Choice for your Father,Brother,Boyfriend or your Friends.
About size: The Size is US Size. Please read the size information refer to the details size chart in the product pictures in order to choose your own size..If you can't find suitable size, please feel free to contact us through Amazon.

reviews.content: Bought this suit for a masquerade ball and was super worried the fit would be off but the sizes were exact and it was a huge hit. Would highly recommend. About as bright pink as you can get
I liked this suit a lot‚Ä¶only thing I didn‚Äôt like about it‚Ä¶ it gets wrinkled very quick and it was a tad baggier for a slim fit‚Ä¶but overall it was nice
I didn‚Äôt like jacket pockets they were all fake but it worked for my son‚Äôs homecoming.

name: Mens Linen Suits Slim Fit Suits for Men Wedding Prom Tuxedo Suit Set 2 Piece Men's Casual Suit Vest Pants Set
description:
Package Including: Vest*1 Pcs + Pants*1 Pcs
Qualified Material : This linen suit vest & pants is made of 60% linen and 40% Cotton, which is lightweight, breathable, durable and comfortable, and quite suitable for four-season wear.
Occasions: This suit set can be dressed for multiple occasions---weddings, business meetings, fashion shows, parties, prom, daily life, homecoming and back to school, any fashion forward parties, any holiday, work and other formal/casual occasions.
How to Choose: Please order the suit according to your actual Chest measurements, not the waist. The pant waist is adjustable within 2-3 inches. For example, if your actual chest measurements is 42 inches, you can order the size L/4236.
Care Instructions---Cleaning: Dry cleaning or hand-washing in cold water; Storage: Always hang on; Pressing: Steam ironing.

name: Men's Linen 2 Piece Suit Slim Fit Wedding Groomsmen Summer Vest Pants Set with Pocket Square
description:
FEATURE--Vest:Four Button,V-Neck,Smooth Back And Adjustable Back Tie,Slim Fit Style;Pants:Flat Front,Zippered Fly,Button End And Adjustable Waist Tab.
2 PIECE? ACTUALLY 3 PIECE!--In Addition To Vest And Pants, We Also Include A High-Quality Pocket Square ($10 Dollars Retail)!Boasting a classic design in a standard regular fit.Take advantage of top-notch tailoring for a look that's not just eye-catching, but comfortable too.
CARE INSTRUCTION--Dry Clean Recommended If Conditions Permit,If You Have To Hand Wash It,Please Keep The Water Temperature Below 40 Degrees And Wash Gently.Steam Ironing,Hang The Suit On The Hangers When You Are Not Wearing Them.
OCCASIONS--Easy To Match With Any Dinner, Banquet, Wedding, Prom, Evening, Party, Ball, Graduation, Ceremony Celebration, Dating, Meeting, Yacht Party, Halloween, Christmas, New Year, Festival, Cruise, Performance, Magician, Chorus, Other Special Events, Etc. Great Gift For Your Friend, Father, Husband, Brother And Son.
CUSTOMER SERVICE--Your Satisfaction Is Our Top Priority. Because We Believe In The Quality Of Our Products, We Think You Should Be Given The Chance To Try Us Out Without Any Risk.You Can Free Return Within 30 Days If You Are Not Satisfied,But Most Of Our Customer Keep It And Buy Again.Such A Perfect 3 Piece Suit Sets, You Deserve It.

reviews.content:
The color of the suit was as advertised. The fit was good but a little on the big side, the material was light.
The only thing I didn't like was how fast it wrinkled and how much. But I guess that is to be expected with linen.
Vest is really tight on me and pants was a little big. Just wear it once and now on my closet lol

I took one star off purely because they should let you mix and match sizes. The pants fit my BF perfectly, but the vest was a bit tight. If we had gone up a size to accommodate the vest, the pants would‚Äôve been falling of.

Bought bluebell & mint green for my husband to decide which to wear at a wedding in Italy with a white dress shirt (not shirt shown in pic). He liked them both so much he decided to keep both. I ordered size Medium after reading reviews. He‚Äôs approximately 180lbs , 5‚Äô10‚Äù with athletic build. Vest fit perfect. The pants were a bit long on both but nothing a quick hem can‚Äôt fix! Steamer will help get wrinkles out. It would be nice if the mint green came with a matching handkerchief because the blue they sent just doesn‚Äôt match well at all.
